title: Global Economy System
description: Enhance your server and increase server engagement with tons of currency commands and an inventory system

title: Custom Welcome Messages
description: Asra lets you design your own welcome messages, that includes a custom welcome card with the user's avatar and name, and welcomes your users for you!

title: Giveaways
description: Hold giveaways on your Discord server quickly and easily!

title: Moderation
description: Manage your Discord server with plenty of useful moderation commands.

title: Advanced configuration
description: Most of Asra's features are fully customisable and can be configured to suit your needs!

title: Much more
description: Autoroles, AFK Status, Levelling, Logs, Reminders, and much more.
